mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.INQIRE_DT , a.SRVC_NM , a.INQIRE_INFO , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.REQUST_ID = #{requestId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.INQIRE_DT , a.SRVC_NM , a.INQIRE_INFO , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.INQIRE_INFO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND a.INQIRE_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchBeginDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY a.INQIRE_DT DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(a.REQUST_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.INQIRE_INFO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND a.INQIRE_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchBeginDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
